helperspkg

Class DistanceCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • helperspkg.DistanceCalculator

  • public abstract class DistanceCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the distance calculators for the matcher. These calculators can be update or new ones added. Euclidean and BinaryDistance were created based on R's distance comparison function, but are optimized for sparse- sorted lists of levels.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DistanceCalculator()

      static double binaryDistance(Summary a, Summary b)
      Calculates the binary distance from one patient to the other.

    • Method Detail

      • euclideanDistance

        public static double euclideanDistance(Summary a,
                                       Summary b)
        Calculates the Euclidean distance from one patient to the other. This means that the function takes into account the VALUE (or number of instances) for each level as well as the existence of a level You are less likely to get duplicate distance values with this than with the binary distance.
        Parameters:
        a - One of the summaries. (it doesn't matter which)
        b - The other summary. (again, it doesn't matter which because the distance will be the same either way.
        Returns:
        The distance between summary a and summary b

      • binaryDistance

        public static double binaryDistance(Summary a,
                                    Summary b)
        Calculates the binary distance from one patient to the other. This means that the function takes into account ONLY the existence of a level, not its value. You are more likely to get duplicate distance values with this than with the Euclidean distance.
        Parameters:
        a - One of the summaries. (it doesn't matter which)
        b - The other summary. (again, it doesn't matter which because the distance will be the same either way.
        Returns:
        The distance between summary a and summary b
